thread.section_title: Park Plaza Victoria London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very impressed - Review
thread.title_full: Very impressed - Review of Park Plaza Victoria London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: curlyjo79
title: Very impressed - Review
text:
My partner booked this hotel and he made a great choice! The location is perfect as it's only a few minutes walk from Victoria Station. Staff were friendly and helpful.
The room was amazing and was impressed by the electric curtains.. view out of the window wasn't the best but didn't spend much time in the room apart from sleeping so that didn't matter.
The breakfast was delicious too. Would definitely like to visit again
